entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries near the Rockies overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the evening. 40 percent chance of flurries near the Rockies overnight then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 19 April 2023
